title: Golang Pointers Comprehension
description: This lab will test your understanding of pointers in Golang. Pointers are used to pass references to values and records within your program.

meta.title: Mastering Golang Pointers: A Comprehensive Guide
meta.description: Explore the power of pointers in Golang through a hands-on tutorial, covering key concepts and practical applications.

verify.name: Verify Pointer Variable Memory Address Manipulation
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
